## Puzzle 1

```{r read_file}
## read in the file

input <- scan(file = "input.txt", what = integer())

pairs <- combn(input, 2)
sums <- combn(input, 2, sum)

Reduce(`*`, pairs[,which(sums == 2020)])
  
```
